title: Gorgeous Highly Upgraded 3-bedroom+Loft Luxury Townhome in Anthem
posting_body: Gorgeous highly upgraded 3-bed luxury townhouse for rent in Inspirada in Anthem.
1,800+ Sqft with 3 bedrooms+loft, 2.5 bathrooms and a 2-car garage that opens up to a back alley.
Open great room with upgraded tile flooring, neutral grey color-scheme, and recessed lighting.
Gorgeous chefs kitchen with island/breakfast bar, pantry, upgraded cabinets, Quartz countertops and S/S appliances.
3 bedrooms+Loft all upstairs.
Luxurious master suite with walk-in closet.
Separate tub and shower in master bathroom with dual sinks.
Bonus loft space upstairs.
Laundry room with full size washer and dryer.
Guest bedrooms share a full bath upstairs.
***Amenities include community pools with spa, Clubhouse with gym and lounge, basketball court, tennis courts, children's playground, dog park, walk/bike trails and skate park.
1-year lease minimum.
***Paint and cleaning to be completed by 7/30 - Available 8/1
Rent: $2,275/month
Security deposit: $2,275
NO PETS
Cleaning deposit: $500
Appl.fee: $70/applicant
Min.qualifications: Proof of income for 3x rent, excellent rental history and 620+ FICO credit score
For more detailed information or to schedule a showing please call
show contact info
Showings available Mo-Sat by appointment only.
Green Valley, Seven Hills and Silverado Ranch area buyer/leasing specialist
American Realty Properties
